section.p: The immunizations section shall contain a narrative description of the immunizations administered to the patient in the past. It shall include entries for medication administration as described in the Entry Content Modules.

ol.li: SHALL conform to CCD Immunizations Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.6)

SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains IHE Immunization (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.12)
SHALL conform to CCD Immunizations Section template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.1.6)
[CCD] SHALL contain [1..1] code/@code = "11369-6" History of immunizations (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC STATIC)

[IHE] SHALL contain [1..*] entry, such that it
contains IHE Immunization (templateId: 1.3.6.1.4.1.19376.1.5.3.1.4.12)
[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: Contains a case-insensitive language-insensitive string containing 'immunization'.

[CCD] SHOULD satisfy: Contains one or more Medication Activity and/or Supply Activity (CONF-376)
[OCL]: self.getEntryTargets(ccd::MedicationActivity)->size() > 0 or self.getEntryTargets(ccd::SupplyActivity)->size() > 0
